author: jeongeun
body:
#### PR description: 
Update the safer syntax for existing parameter :
- drop type specifications where the original parameter exists.
- cleaning reco python configurations (remove duplicated line, delete the obsolete file)

Instead of modifying parameters with full type specs, which can be interpreted as an insertion of a new parameter, it is a safer way to protect from parameter name mistakes and will also help in possible parameter migrations.
(previous PRs for RecoMuon are [PR#30270](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/30270), [PR#30271](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/30271), [PR#30353](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/30353)  )

In this PR, a total of 7 files changed. 

RecoMuon/GlobalMuonProducer 1 file
RecoMuon/MuonIsolationProducers 1 file
RecoMuon/MuonSeedGenerator 5 file

delete one empty file = RecoMuon/MuonSeedGenerator/python/mcMuonSeeds_cff.py file 
#### PR validation:
Event Content comparison check was also done and there is no change with these updates.
Tested in CMSSW_11_2_X, the basic test all passed in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html).
title: drop type specifications in RecoMuon
